name: AssembleExplanationOfBenefit
title: Assemble ExplanationOfBenefit
description:
This operation is used to return ExplanationOfBenefit resources related to a patient along with all the reference resources. 

 The operation takes the optional input parameters: 
  - patient id
  - start date
  - end date
  - document type 

 and returns a [Bundle](http://hl7.org/fhir/bundle.html) of type "searchset" containing [CARIN BB ExplanationOfBenefit and reference resources](https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/profiles.html) for the patient. The principle intended use for this operation is to provide a patient with access to their available ExplanationOfBenefit information.
comment: - The server is responsible for determining the reference resources to return as [included](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/search.html#revinclude) resources rather than the client specifying which ones. This frees the client from needing to determine what it could or should ask for. Rhe server SHALL return all the reference resources within the return bundle along with the ExplanationOfBenefitn resources. The server's CapabilityStatement should document this behavior.

parameter.name: patient
parameter.documentation: The id of the patient resource located on the server on which this operation is executed.  If there is no match, an empty Bundle is returned

parameter.name: _since
parameter.documentation: ExplanationOfBenefit resources updated after this period will be included in the response. The intent of this parameter is to allow a client to request only records that have changed since the last request.

parameter.name: type
parameter.documentation: The type of the ExplanationOfBenefit, e.g. inpatient, outpatient, pharmacy, etc.

parameter.name: service-date
parameter.documentation: Date of the service for the ExplanationOfBenefit.

parameter.name: identifier
parameter.documentation: Claim Number / Business Identifier of the ExplanationOfBenefit resource.

parameter.name: _id
parameter.documentation: Logical id for the ExplanationOfBenefit resource.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: The bundle type is "searchset"containing [CARIN BB ExplanationOfBenefit and reference resources](https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/profiles.html)
